nodes.text: Further Discussions With Lanius is an article written by Morrie Mullins as a tie in to the Living Force campaign. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on August 29 2002 and took the form of an interview of Jedi Masters Kirlocca and Lanius Qel-Bertuk on happenings in the Cularin systems, specifically the activity of the Believers.
